extends java.io.File

      • show

        public void show(javax.swing.JPanel dstPanel,
        boolean adaptSize)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.Exception
        Show current image into the destination panel. Userful for GUI integration, but you should take care of the repainting (override method "public void paint(Graphics g)" for the main window)
        Parameters:
        dstPanel - The panel where the image will be displayed
        adaptSize - Indicates if the image size will be adated to the container (True) or not (False).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs loading the image.
        java.lang.Exception - if a general exception is generated by used components.

      • show

        public void show(javax.swing.JPanel dstPanel,
        java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp transformOp)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.Exception
        Show current image into the destination panel. Userful for GUI integration, but you should take care of the repainting (override method "public void paint(Graphics g)" for the main window)
        Parameters:
        dstPanel - The panel where the image will be displayed
        transformOp - Gives a transformation to apply to the image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs loading the image.
        java.lang.Exception - if a general exception is generated by used components.

      • show

        public javax.swing.JDialog show(boolean modal)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.Exception
        Show current image in a new dialog. Useful for command line applications.
        Parameters:
        modal - True for modal dialog (pause execution) or False for non modal dialog.
        Returns:
        Dialog object created for image visualization (only if non-modal option is selected)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs loading the image.
        java.lang.Exception - if a general exception is generated by used components.

      • show

        public javax.swing.JDialog show(boolean modal,
                       BasicCtrl controller)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.Exception
        Show current image in a new dialog. Useful for command line applications.
        Parameters:
        modal - True for modal dialog (pause execution) or False for non modal dialog.
        controller - Allows to give a listener object to redirect basic events.
        Returns:
        Dialog object created for image visualization (only if non-modal option is selected)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs loading the image.
        java.lang.Exception - if a general exception is generated by used components.
